attributes.action: Tevez should be sent to jail for driving while disqualified and without insurance
attributes.additional_details:
The Government should review the decision to impose 250 hours of community service and a six-month driving ban along with a puny £1,145 fine.(Tevez earns £196,000 a week)

Tevez has shown total contempt for the law of this country, he was caught driving whilst disqualified and without insurance which people go to prison for.

Nobody is above the law. Tevez should receive a jail sentence and his car should be impounded and crushed "No Insurance No Car" That's the slogan.
